moduleMetadataJson.name: Windows Gather Active Directory Users
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module will enumerate user accounts in the default Active Domain (AD) directory and stores
      them in the database. If GROUP_MEMBER is set to the DN of a group, this will list the members of
      that group by performing a recursive/nested search (i.e. it will list users who are members of
      groups that are members of groups that are members of groups (etc) which eventually include the
      target group DN.
author: Ben Campbell <eat_meatballs@hotmail.co.uk>
Carlos Perez <carlos_perez@darkoperator.com>
Stuart Morgan <stuart.morgan@mwrinfosecurity.com>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: DOMAIN
options.description: The domain to query or distinguished name (e.g. DC=test,DC=com)

options.name: MAX_SEARCH
options.description: Maximum values to retrieve, 0 for all.

options.name: ADDITIONAL_FIELDS
options.description: Additional fields to retrieve, comma separated

options.name: GROUP_MEMBER
options.description: Recursively list users that are effectve members of the group DN specified.

options.name: UAC
options.description: Filter on User Account Control Setting. (Accepted: ANY, NO_PASSWORD, CHANGE_PASSWORD, NEVER_EXPIRES, SMARTCARD_REQUIRED, NEVER_LOGGEDON)
